title: Squadra Technologies secRMM
descriptionMarkdown: Use the Squadra Technologies secRMM Data Connector to push USB removable storage security event data into Azure Sentinel Log Analytics.

sampleQueries.description: Alert on USB removable storage devices ONLINE events
Which users are writing files to removable storage devices
sampleQueries.query: secRMM_CL | where Event_s == 'WRITE COMPLETED' | summarize count() by User_s

sampleQueries.description: Microsoft BitLocker Activity for removable storage devices
Microsoft Windows Defender Activity for removable storage devices

sampleQueries.query: secRMM_CL | where DeviceDescription_s contains ' ENCRYPTED Removable Media'

sampleQueries.description: Users who have tried to execute macros or programs from a removable storage device
sampleQueries.query: secRMM_CL | where ((Event_s == 'BLOCK MACROS ON DEVICE ACTIVE') or (Event_s == 'BLOCK PROGRAMS ON DEVICE ACTIVE')) | summarize count() by User_s

sampleQueries.description: Removable storage devices that are not encrypted (hardware or software)
Removable storage devices that are mounted into a Virtual Machine (from physical)
sampleQueries.query: secRMM_CL | where ((Event_s == 'EXTERNAL') and (Message contains 'ONLINE') and (Message contains 'Virtual Machine'))

sampleQueries.description: Removable storage devices that are mounted into a Virtual Machine (from virtual)
Show mobile devices that are being USB mounted
Show mobile devices that are being USB mounted but are not MDM (Microsoft Intune) enrolled
sampleQueries.query: secRMM_CL | where ((Event_s == 'ONLINE') and (AdditionalProgramInfo_s contains 'Mobile device is not MDM enrolled'))

dataTypes.name: secRMM_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery: secRMM_CL | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated) | where isnotempty(Time)

value:
secRMM_CL
 | summarize LastLogReceived = max(TimeGenerated)
 | project IsConnected = LastLogReceived > ago(30d)

resourceProvider.permissionsDisplayText: read and write permissions are required.

read permissions to shared keys for the workspace are required. [See the documentation to learn more about workspace keys](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/platform/agent-windows#obtain-workspace-id-and-key).

instructionSteps.description: Follow the step-by-step instructions provided in the [Squadra Technologies configuration guide for Azure Sentinel](http://www.squadratechnologies.com/StaticContent/ProductDownload/secRMM/9.9.0.0/secRMMAzureSentinelAdministratorGuide.pdf)
